thread.title: Disney Parks After Dark: A Night in Morocco
thread.title_full: Disney Parks After Dark: A Night in Morocco

author: Jennifer Fickley-Baker
title: Disney Parks After Dark: A Night in Morocco
text:
Tonight’s “ Disney Parks After Dark ” image was snapped in the Morocco Pavilion at Epcot . 
The pavilion, which opened its doors at the park in 1984, offers Moroccan cuisine and belly dancing entertainment at Restaurant Marrakesh and tapas and lake-front dining at Spice Road Table .
This show was taken inside the pavilion’s bazaar, which is chock full of unique treasures, like fezzes, Moroccan hanging lanterns, belly dancer scarves and much more.
